attributes.action: debate the abolition of the British Monarchy
attributes.additional_details: The British People cannot afford the Monarchy.  Most modern European Countries are Republics. Monarchy is an outdated concept. The British Taxpayer cannot afford to pay for the Monarchy.
attributes.background: Hold a debate on the Abolition of the British Monarchy

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/624343
